name: heavy-industry
author: Wisadell
subtitle: Heavy Industry Java Mod
description:
[red]Warning: This mod currently only supports clients above version be25394. Please do not download this mod for clients above version v146![]
Install for fresh and revised mindustry experience.
Please note:
This Mod is a Java class Mod, therefore it does not support running on the iOS platform.
Try not to mix with other Mods as much as possible to avoid unknown issues in the game.
